
---
title: "GetDirectory"
title_tag: "Function GetDirectory | Module directoryservice | Package AWS"
meta_desc: "Explore the GetDirectory function of the directoryservice module, including examples, input properties, output properties, and supporting types. Get attributes of AWS Directory Service directory (SimpleAD, Managed AD, AD Connector). It&#39;s especially useful to refer AWS Managed AD or on-premise AD in AD Connector configuration. "
---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Get attributes of AWS Directory Service directory (SimpleAD, Managed AD, AD Connector). It's especially useful to refer AWS Managed AD or on-premise AD in AD Connector configuration. 

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as aws from "@pulumi/aws";

const example = aws_directory_service_directory_main.id.apply(id => aws.directoryservice.getDirectory({
    directoryId: id,
}, { async: true }));
```

{{% /example %}}
{{% /examples %}}

## GetDirectory Result {#result}

The following output properties are available:




{{% choosable language csharp %}}

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Access<wbr>Url</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The access URL for the directory/connector, such as http://alias.awsapps.com.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Alias</span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The alias for the directory/connector, such as `d-991708b282.awsapps.com`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>Connect<wbr>Settings</span>

    </dt>

            title="">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#getdirectoryvpcsetting">Get<wbr>Directory<wbr>Vpc<wbr>Setting[]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>tags</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">{[key: string]: any}</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A mapping of tags assigned to the directory/connector.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}


{{% choosable language python %}}
<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>access_<wbr>url</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The access URL for the directory/connector, such as http://alias.awsapps.com.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>alias</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The alias for the directory/connector, such as `d-991708b282.awsapps.com`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>connect_<wbr>settings</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}{{% /md %}}</dd>

            title="">

    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>directory_<wbr>id</span>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>dns_<wbr>ip_<wbr>addresses</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">List[str]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A list of IP addresses of the DNS servers for the directory/connector.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>edition</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}(for `MicrosoftAD`) The Microsoft AD edition (`Standard` or `Enterprise`).
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>enable_<wbr>sso</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">bool</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The directory/connector single-sign on status.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The fully qualified name for the directory/connector.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>security_<wbr>group_<wbr>id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the security group created by the directory/connector.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>short_<wbr>name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The short name of the directory/connector, such as `CORP`.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>size</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}(for `SimpleAD` and `ADConnector`) The size of the directory/connector (`Small` or `Large`).
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>type</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The directory type (`SimpleAD`, `ADConnector` or `MicrosoftAD`).
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span>vpc_<wbr>settings</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#getdirectoryvpcsetting">List[Get<wbr>Directory<wbr>Vpc<wbr>Setting]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}{{% /md %}}</dd>

            title="">

    </dt>

{{% /md %}}</dd>

<h4 id="getdirectoryconnectsetting">Get<wbr>Directory<wbr>Connect<wbr>Setting</h4>
{{% choosable language nodejs %}}
> See the   <a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/aws/types/output/#GetDirectoryConnectSetting">output</a> API doc for this type.
{{% /choosable %}}

> See the   <a href="https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/pulumi/pulumi-aws/sdk/v2/go/aws/directoryservice?tab=doc#GetDirectoryConnectSetting">output</a> API doc for this type.

<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Customer<wbr>Dns<wbr>Ips</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The DNS IP addresses of the domain to connect to.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

            title="Required">
        <span>Customer<wbr>Username</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The username corresponding to the password provided.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Subnet<wbr>Ids</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The identifiers of the subnets for the connector servers (2 subnets in 2 different AZs).
{{% /md %}}</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Vpc<wbr>Id</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ID of the VPC that the connector is in.
{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
